website_summaries.verdict: An impressively fast commercial printing calculator that comes with a 3 yr. warranty.
pros: This calculator is manufactured using 45% recycled plastic and it features a large display screen for easy viewing
The unit can print 4.6 lines per second and has 2 colors
There are a number of specialized keys that allow you to quickly perform many functions needed when doing business
cons: Although this model is designed for commercial use and it is a high-quality printing calculator, the price is higher than expected

customer_reviews.title: "Extra Heavy Duty" it's not
customer_reviews.text: I'm a CPA and need a calculator that stands up to lots of day to day adding. This calculator does not appear to be made any better than the $40 ones, and at only a month old already has keys that don't work. I have to hit the 0 exactly from above or it does not register the number and my whole total is off. As soon as tax season is over I will take the time to send this machine back - it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I am having to change my rating to one star, as this product is no longer working after 5 months. Not all the digits are printing, you only see every other number. Totals are wrong, etc.. The 0 sticks. Good thing this product is still under manufacture warranty, however I am having to send it back. I will be without a calculator for 2 weeks, meaning I will have to purchase another one in the mean time. I bought two of these for the office and we did love them, however they did not last.
customer_reviews.author: Elyn Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best calculator out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a bookkeeper for 30 years and I own three of these (one for each of my desks). They are long lasting and durable machines. I use them constantly! This model is set up to exactly fit my hand and I never get tired of running long tapes on it. Also they use the universal ribbons which is great because I hate the newfangled ink attachments other brands have started using. This transaction went very smooth. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bernadine J. Price

customer_reviews.title: I loved this calculator
customer_reviews.text: I loved this calculator. The touch of the key pad was very good, was quiet and fast. After only 3 months I had a malfunction where it would constantly clear on its own while I was inputting numbers. Made it impossible to use. Customer service was excellent and I am ready to replace it with this exact same model hoping the problem I had with the first one was just a fluke. It is a beautiful calculator and looks great on the desk also.
customer_reviews.author: maryanne

customer_reviews.title: DOES WHAT IS IT SUPPOSE TO DO...IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: THIS MACHINE IS FULL SIZE HEAVY DUTY, QUIET & FAST LIKE IT SHOULD BE. LOVE IT! IT PRINTS RED & BLACK AS YOU'D EXPECT USING A 2 SPOOL RIBBON & REGULAR PAPER ROLL TAPE.J IT COMES IN NICE BLACK FINISH. HAD A VICTOR BEFORE A LONG TIME & WAS SO HAPPY TO FIND THIS REPLACEMENT AFTER TRYING SEVERAL OTHER BRANDS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: it's sturdy and quiet. So far, so good on the service. it's too soon to tell. on the negative side, it's big, and I would have preferred a white one if they made it. but very functional.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerMarc

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I share an office with the bookkeeper and she requested a full-size calculator with paper feed, etc. Somehow being the tech person I'm the person people go to if they want to purchase anything remotely technical for the office. So, I set out looking for a nice calculator that was quiet and could withstand heavy "abuse." While I was quite surprised by it's sized, our bookkeeper loves it and I love it because it is much quieter than any similar calculator. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Best Calculator
customer_reviews.text: If you require frequest use of a calculator, Victor is the only choice. It's fast response, the keys keep up with fast calculating input, the keys do not roll but are highly sensitive so you do not lose accuracy from a key failing to respond. It's lightweight yet sturdy. It's a little more money but well worth every penny. I have two: one for work and one for home. After using the Victor, I would always find a way to purchase this machine over any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beaubien

customer_reviews.title: Glass all scratched up
customer_reviews.text: I must got a used one ,my glass was all scratched up no paperwork with it. It seems to work okay but may have to get refund because I don't like to have a scratch up one, I own two more of these older models and they look newer then this one
customer_reviews.author: INDUSTRIAL MACHINE

customer_reviews.title: not what the hype title says it is
customer_reviews.text: the enter key is a bit difficult to press to engage. I think the product is a bit over-rated for the cost. My old Royal works 3x better than this one. I also don't think the "Extra Heavy Duty" lives up to it's moniker here. Not an overly sturdy little calc either
customer_reviews.author: showtime

customer_reviews.title: THIS SELLER WAS GREAT AND TREATED ME THE WAY A PERSON SHOULD BE TREATED
customer_reviews.text: I COMPLAINED ABOUT THE PRODUCT AND IT WAS PROBABLY GOOD FOR A WAREHOUSE ETC BUT NOT FOR MY OFFICE. I DID NOT KNOW THERE WAS A "NO RETURN" POLICY. BUT THE SELLER REFUNDED MY MONEY. I WAS VERY IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Evridge

customer_reviews.title: Built to take it......
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty machine, intended for office use. Key sequence for multiplication and division is not intuitive, and there is no cover, thus 4 stars. Uses regular paper tape, not thermal. Comes with a started roll only.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Desktop Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Replaced as old desktop with this one and it was the perfect replacement. Easy touch and great features. The only question is, “why didn’t I get it sooner?”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding purchase very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this workhorse. Exactly what I wanted; a strong calculator with no unnecessary bells and whistles that will likely outlast me. Perfect tool and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MarieM

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator have one at work and one at home. Perfect for smaller hands, keys are closer together.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: beast
customer_reviews.text: Was expensive but it is a beast of a calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Warren

customer_reviews.title: it is like new
customer_reviews.text: doing accounting classes and this is a must have. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Big calculator, now all I need are some big numbers
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large calculator! Make sure you have room! Nice big buttons and display too.
customer_reviews.author: Some dude

customer_reviews.title: but Victor is my favorite. For the price
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I’m a little bias when it comes to a 10-key, but Victor is my favorite. For the price, you can’t beat this calculator. It has everything you need and can compete with a much more expensive model. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast - Able to keep up
customer_reviews.text: Really holds up! It is fast - some other calculators don't keep up with my key strokes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this calculator, is fast to calculate. Glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Review of Victor 1460-4
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Victor 1460-4 calculator. Tried cheaper calculators for my business but they sounded so loud and cheap. This has a quieter printer than most and just has a good feel to it. Does more stuff than I'll ever need. On other, cheaper calculators, the printing on the tape started too far down in the calculator, you had to be right up against it to see the last number printed. This is a little better. Bought because my accountant had another model by Victor and recommended a Victor.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Guy

customer_reviews.title: it lasted 4 months very disappointed, also with customer service
customer_reviews.text: Its pure junk, it lasted 4 months very disappointed, also with customer service, they want me to pay shipping to return it for repair. I feel that I should not pay shipping for a calculator that only lasted 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: TONY S.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Relatively quiet to previous calculators. Good dark print, easy to read. Built solid. However, these are my impressions during the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our awesome accountant. She is VERY happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Herrera

customer_reviews.title: A clearly superior product - thank you
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a Canon for the past year and it finally quit on me. Based on reviews I bought this Victor and there is truly no comparison between the Canon and the Victor. A clearly superior product - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy machine with large buttons and large display. Very quiet operation.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen A.

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love every function or our new toy (calculator)
customer_reviews.text: We appreciate that our Victor calculator arrived in a timely fashion and in one piece. We absolutely love every function or our new toy (calculator)! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gentilcore

customer_reviews.title: Barbara
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, love it. This is my second I have one at home and one at work. Definitely recommend this calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this Calculator. Everything as advertised. But i like how responsive the keys are. I also like the black color.
customer_reviews.author: JanZ

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, the touch is fast and is doing the ...
customer_reviews.text: As a bookkeeper, I've had a TI-5604 heavy-duty calculator for so many years, it actually began to make errors in totaling equations. And as it has been an extension of my arm for any math calculations, it was very hard to let it go. But the Victor 1460-4 has become my new right arm extension. It is sturdy, the touch is fast and is doing the exact job required.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am totally amazed at how quiet this calculator is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy. Like it a lot but it's not the same as my old, old Victor
customer_reviews.author: cocopuff

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CHOICE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator. I don't like smaller key spacing, so the spacing on this calculator is perfect for me. While keeping books, I make far less mistakes with this calculator. The tape read-out as well as the lighted display are very easy to see. As I read in another review, the keys may take a little more pressure, but that makes for less errors. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My calculator came in record time and it's just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lentell

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet, But Keys Close Together
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet calculator, even with using the printer, but I felt the keys were too close together to perform high speed calculations. I also felt that the keys did not have a postive feeling - not necessarily mushy, but not a good, quick response.
customer_reviews.author: jaysb

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk. The company did not give me ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. The company did not give me a refund when I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Victor 1460-4 12 Digit Extra Heavy Duty Commercial Printing Calculator
product_meta.description: 12 digit calculator is perfect for the everyday advanced user, especially in a busy office setting. Extra heavy duty durability is perfect for power users. Features an extra large, 17 mm tall fluorescent display digits for easy viewing. Contemporary black styling compliments any modern desktop decor. Environmental friendly, this calculator is manufactured with 45% recycled plastic. You can count on the fast and reliable 4.6 lines-per-second ribbon printer. Cost/sell/margin keys make for quick and easy profit margin calculations (simply enter two variables and the third automatically appears). Other functions include: two independent tax keys, constants in multiplication and division, percentage add-on and discount, time/date, change sign key, large-size add and subtract keys, item count, fully selectable decimal settings, date/non-add key, and selectable rounding switches and 4 key independent memory. AC Power. 3 Year Manufacturer's Standard Warranty.
feature_bullets: Huge 12 Digit Fluorescent Display, 17mm tall display digits
Fast and Heavy Duty 4.6 Lines Per Second 2 Color Printer
Extra Heavy Duty Commercial Printing Calculator for the toughest applications

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
